00020 const int nMaxNestedSizers = 20;
00021 
00022 enum teShuttleMode
00023 {
00024    eIsCreating,
00025    eIsGettingFromDialog,
00026    eIsSettingToDialog,
00027    eIsSavingViaShuttle,
00028    eIsGettingViaShuttle,
00029 
00030    // Next two are only ever seen in constructor.
00031    // After that they revert to one of the modes above.
00032    // They are used to achieve 'two step' operation,
00033    // where we transfer between two shuttles in one go.
00034    eIsCreatingFromPrefs,
00035    eIsSavingToPrefs
00036 };

00177 //-- Variants of the standard Tie functions which do two step exchange in one go
00178 // Note that unlike the other Tie functions, ALL the arguments are const.
00179 // That's because the data is being exchanged between the dialog and mpShuttle
00180 // so it doesn't need an argument that is writeable.

00319 // ShuttleGui extends ShuttleGuiBase with Audacity specific extensions.
00320 class AUDACITY_DLL_API ShuttleGui : public ShuttleGuiBase
00321 {
00322 public:
00323    ShuttleGui(wxWindow * pParent,teShuttleMode ShuttleMode);
00324    ~ShuttleGui(void);
00325 public:
00326    ShuttleGui & Id(int id );
00327    ShuttleGui & Prop( int iProp ){ ShuttleGuiBase::Prop(iProp); return *this;}; // Has to be here too, to return a ShuttleGui and not a ShuttleGuiBase.
00328    GuiWaveTrack * AddGuiWaveTrack( const wxString & Name);
00329    AdornedRulerPanel * AddAdornedRuler( ViewInfo *pViewInfo );
00330    RulerPanel * AddRulerVertical( float low, float hi, const wxString & Units );
00331    AttachableScrollBar * AddAttachableScrollBar( long style = wxSB_HORIZONTAL );
00332    void AddStandardButtons( long buttons = eOkButton | eCancelButton, wxButton *extra = NULL );
00333 };
